channel.description: Recent content in ARTIK, ARTIK-520, Droplit, droplit-edge, IoT on David G. Simmons

item.title: ARTIK-520 as a Droplit.io Edge Device
item.description: Doing some further work with my trusty ARTIK-520 (hey, when you have a hammer, everything looks like a nail! Back up off me! ) I decided to try installing another IoT Gateway framework on it. (I’ve done that before.) Equal opportunity and all that. And I’ll be doing more of them as soon as I get more mini-SD Cards in-house. But I digress. I originally just followed the basic install instructions for deploying a Droplit.
